meanings.definition: A condition in which the skin appears to have areas with underlying fat deposits, giving it a dimpled, lumpy appearance.
meanings.sent1: She was self-conscious about the cellulite on her thighs.
meanings.sent2: Many people try different creams to reduce cellulite on their bodies.
meanings.sent3: The cellulite on her legs seemed to have a mind of its own, jiggling with every step.
meanings.sent4: The moon's surface looked like cellulite, with its craters and bumps.
meanings.sent5: The cellulite on the orange peel made it look unique and textured.

meanings.definition: The dimpled, lumpy appearance of skin caused by underlying fat deposits.
meanings.sent1: Her cellulite made her feel insecure at the beach.
meanings.sent2: The cellulite on her arms was noticeable when she raised them.
meanings.sent3: The cellulite on the mattress made it look like a bumpy ride.
meanings.sent4: The old painting had cellulite-like textures, adding depth to the artwork.
meanings.sent5: The cellulite on the cheese gave it a distinct, uneven look.
